module.name: Backup & Restore
module.description: Backup & Restore for your FreePBX environment
module.changelog: *15.0.3alpha9* FREEPBX-18252 Fix variables in Backup, handle the use of a single module *15.0.3alpha8* FREEPBX-18202 Fix restore file ajax handling *15.0.3alpha7* FREEPBX-18160 Migration improvements *15.0.3alpha6* FREEPBX-18215 Fix the mail handler validation *15.0.3alpha5* FREEPBX-18210 Remove unimplemented tab *15.0.3alpha4* FREEPBX-18160 Fix server migration *15.0.3alpha3* Remove unneeded composer deps *15.0.3alpha2* Fix import of cron job for backup migration *15.0.3alpha1* Alpha 1 release of the Backup 15 module *15.0.2.1* Don't crash on a new install *15.0.2* Packaging of ver 15.0.2 *15.0.1* Initial release of new backup module
